CustomField.description: Flat Amount of savings account. This specifies the maximum amount that can be withdrawn from a savings account per day. For a group savings account, this restriction applies to each withdrawal. If left blank or “0”, then system does not assume any withdrawal limitations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flat Amount of savings account. This specifies the maximum amount that can be withdrawn from a savings account per day. For a group savings account, this restriction applies to each withdrawal.
CustomField.label: Max Amount Per Withdrawal
